name: Dun & Bradstreet D&B Direct+ API
description: Comprehensive business intelligence platform providing company data, risk assessments, and analytics for due diligence, credit decisions, and business development. Covers 430+ million companies globally with real-time data enrichment.

access_info.pricing_model: Subscription-based with usage tiers - contact sales for custom pricing
access_info.rate_limits: Varies by subscription tier, typically 1000+ requests per day

endpoints.description: Obtain OAuth bearer token for API authentication
Retrieve comprehensive company data by DUNS number
endpoints.response_format: JSON with detailed company profile and financial data

endpoints.description: Search for companies using various criteria
endpoints.response_format: JSON with array of matching companies

content_summary.update_frequency: Real-time to daily updates depending on data type

research_notes.api_summary: D&B Direct+ provides comprehensive business intelligence with company data, risk assessments, and analytics covering 430+ million companies globally. Features OAuth authentication, multiple data products, and real-time enrichment capabilities for due diligence and credit decisions.

name: RavenPack Analytics API
description: Advanced news analytics and sentiment analysis platform processing 40,000+ news sources in real-time. Provides structured analytics, sentiment scoring, and event detection for financial markets with 20+ years of historical data.

access_info.pricing_model: Custom pricing based on data volume - Enterprise licenses start at $50K+ annually
access_info.rate_limits: JSON endpoint: 10,000 records for granular datasets, 500 entities for indicator datasets

endpoints.description: List available datasets and their configurations
endpoints.response_format: JSON array of dataset objects with metadata

endpoints.description: Real-time JSON endpoint for small data requests

research_notes.api_summary: RavenPack processes 40,000+ news sources in real-time providing structured analytics, sentiment scoring, and event detection for financial markets. Features 20+ years of historical data, streaming capabilities, and Python/R client libraries for algorithmic trading and risk management.

name: Alexandria Technology NLP API
description: AI-powered Natural Language Processing platform specializing in financial text analysis. Provides sentiment analysis, entity recognition, and thematic insights from earnings calls, news, and social media with proven alpha generation capabilities.

access_info.pricing_model: Custom pricing based on data requirements and usage volume

endpoints.description: Access earnings call sentiment and thematic analysis
endpoints.response_format: JSON with sentiment scores and thematic breakdowns

endpoints.description: Company news sentiment analysis from premium publishers
endpoints.response_format: JSON with news sentiment metrics and article metadata

endpoints.description: ESG-focused sentiment analysis from news and reports
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG sentiment scores by category

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global coverage for all publicly traded companies
content_summary.update_frequency: Real-time to 1-hour delays depending on data source

research_notes.api_summary: Alexandria Technology provides AI-powered NLP for financial text analysis with proven alpha generation capabilities. Specializes in earnings call sentiment, news analytics, and ESG analysis with real-time processing and global coverage.

documentation.api_reference: Full API reference available to subscribers
documentation.examples: Python and R code examples provided

name: Amenity Analytics NLP API
description: Enterprise-grade NLP platform for financial text analysis with >90% accuracy. Extracts insights from earnings calls, SEC filings, news, and internal documents. Specializes in deception detection, ESG analysis, and custom financial event taxonomies.

access_info.pricing_model: Custom pricing - AWS Marketplace options available starting from enterprise tiers ($500K+ solutions)
access_info.rate_limits: Varies by subscription and deployment type

endpoints.description: Fundamental analysis insights from financial documents
endpoints.response_format: JSON with fundamental event insights and sentiment

endpoints.description: Analyze earnings calls for deceptive language patterns
endpoints.response_format: JSON with deception scores and analysis

endpoints.description: ESG sentiment analysis with UN SDG framework
endpoints.response_format: JSON with ESG sentiment scores and materiality assessments

content_summary.update_frequency: Real-time to daily depending on data source and deployment

research_notes.api_summary: Amenity Analytics provides enterprise-grade NLP with >90% accuracy for financial text analysis. Specializes in deception detection, ESG analysis, and custom financial event taxonomies with AWS Marketplace availability and SOC 2 compliance.

documentation.api_reference: Complete API reference available to subscribers

name: Social Market Analytics API
description: Licensed Twitter partner providing social media sentiment analysis for financial markets. Aggregates professional investor sentiment from Twitter and social platforms with 9+ years of historical data and proven predictive capabilities.

access_info.pricing_model: Custom pricing based on data volume and real-time requirements

endpoints.description: Search social sentiment data with filtering options
endpoints.response_format: JSON/XML with sentiment scores and social metrics
Streaming JSON with real-time sentiment updates
JSON with historical sentiment time series

content_summary.geographic_scope: Global social media coverage with focus on English-language content

research_notes.api_summary: Social Market Analytics is a licensed Twitter partner providing social media sentiment analysis for financial markets. Features 9+ years of historical data, real-time streaming, and specialized focus on professional investor sentiment with proven predictive capabilities.
